\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 78656}

\subsection*{A Wonderful Day 2 - Full Circle}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Stoned Intellect}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & inhaled & CP 55,940 & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 175.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
The Purpose of this report is inform the recreational community on the effects of CP 55,940:



This being my second report on CP5, it could be the last. I feel I have learned everything about it I need to. I have gone through withdrawal, overcame it, and now use CP5 as an alternative to Cannabis. 



I ended use of CP5 for 2 weeks to re-evaluate its use from a sober state. This re-evaluation occurred last night, and the effect was identical to that of vaporizing marijuana. And last night, having lost tolerance, I was ultimately high off of only a few milligrams\ldots rather than the 30mg-a-day I was doing before. 



So responsible use is the best way to enjoy this, so I can achieve that `perfect' high that is found with both marijuana and CP5 when used after a long sobriety-streak. End of report.

\end{document}
